# NixOS Knowledge Base

This file contains reference links for configuring NixOS.

## NixOS Resources

- Wiki: https://nixos.wiki/wiki/NixOS

## Dendritic Nix

The configuration uses the Dendritic Nix Pattern, which uses flake-parts modules to structure the configuration.

- Overview: https://dendrix.oeiuwq.com/Dendritic.html
- Design Guide: https://github.com/Doc-Steve/dendritic-design-with-flake-parts

## Niri Resources

### Main Repository & Documentation

- GitHub: https://github.com/sodiboo/niri-flake https://www.github.com/YaLTeR/niri
- Official Docs: https://github.com/sodiboo/niri-flake/blob/main/docs.md
- Wiki: https://wiki.nixos.org/wiki/Niri
- Example Configs: https://github.com/sodiboo/system/blob/main/personal/niri.mod.nix

## DMS (Dank Material Shell) Resources

### Main Repository & Documentation

- GitHub: https://github.com/AvengeMedia/DankMaterialShell
- Official Docs: https://danklinux.com/docs
- Configuration Guide: https://danklinux.com/docs/dankmaterialshell/nixos-flake
- Example Configs: https://gitlab.com/theblackdon/donix https://gitlab.com/theblackdon/black-don-os
